verses.roman:
āra sampradāye nāce paṇḍita-vakreśvara
śrīvāsa nāce āra sampradāya-bhitara

synonyms: āra sampradāye—in another sampradāya, or group; nāce—dances; paṇḍita-vakreśvara—Vakreśvara Paṇḍita; śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; nāce—dances; āra—another; sampradāya-bhitara—in the middle of a group.
translation: Vakreśvara Paṇḍita began to dance in another group, and in yet another group Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura began to dance.
